original_text: Also, this is what Isaiah said very bravely: ‘God says: Those people who were not looking for me have found me. I showed myself to people who were not even asking about me.’ 10: See Isaiah 65:1. Isaiah is speaking about the Gentiles. They were not waiting for Christ, God's Messiah, to come. They did not know anything about him. But because God is kind, he sent his good news to them. Also, this is what Isaiah said very bravely:
korean_text: 이사야는 매우 담대하여 내가 나를 찾지 아니한 자들에게 찾은 바 되고 내게 묻지 아니한 자들에게 나타났노라 말하였고

sentences.original_text: Also, this is what Isaiah said very bravely
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 이것은 이사야가 매우 담대하게 말한 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Those people who were not looking for me
to people who were not even asking about me
Isaiah is speaking about the Gentiles
They were not waiting for Christ
They did not know anything about him
he sent his good news to them
Also, this is what Isaiah said very bravely
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 이것은 이사야가 매우 담대하게 말한 것입니다
